items.sentence: Tom\'s virtually admitted that it was his fault.
Tom believes that Mary can take care of herself.

Tom bought Mary everything she asked him to buy.
We have a lot of work to do before that happens.

After we walked for a while, we got to the lake.
Tom probably doesn\'t know Mary\'s phone number.
Tom admitted that he had stolen money from Mary.

Tom advised Mary not to leave her door unlocked.
Tom advised Mary to do that as soon as possible.
Tom advised Mary to take better care of herself.

How many years has it been since I last saw you?
